1.content:
"It was sure nice of the guard captain to lend us this these quarters" Chris commented, and sent down the 5th strawberry flavored fizzy drink that afternoon.

"After you recovered the lost oil deeds, it was the least he could do to show his gratitude really." Jamie added. S/He had already attracted a small crowd of young locals, who never had the chance to spy on a white person of the opposite sex sunbathing before.

The HH detective trio - Summer, Chris, and Jamie - were relaxing on the terasse of a high class resort, all three in their swimsuits.

"It's too bad that your parents didn't allow Mouse to come along." Jamie said.
"You don't have to tell me, she was positively steaming." Summer replied.
She scribbled WISH YOU WERE HERE on the back of a postcard in big bold letters and lied back in her chair. The thought of her annoying sister stuck in her room filled her soul with joy. Life was good.
"But we won't be left without a sidekick - the captain said that a kid of our age will be waiting for us at the next location."

"Well, I'm sure these guys here are feeling very relieved." Chris said.
A couple of guards ran past, and almost knocked Chris' chair over.
"Hey! What gives?"
"They are the sheikh's guards "Jamie said in a conspiratory tone. "Apparently there's been a phantom thief going around. But no-body knows how she got in..."
------
Summer threw herself on the large, ornate double bed (all three kids got their own rooms) with such enthusiasm that she did not even get out of her swimsuit.
She regretted it then she woke up a few hours later and saw her hands tied in front of her. She realized that she was on her stomach and her ankles were attached to the footboard.
She heard a figure silently move behind her in the darkness.
She closed her eyes in case it went away and right enough, in a moment she felt something caress her sole.
"What do you want." she stated.

"Steady, American girl...All the Serpent wants is the name of your next destination."
"What for?" Summer was thinking fast - did they talk to anyone on the way here who'd know that they'd be here?

"For the sake of your ticklish feet. Koochie koo."

Summer always hated this - the part when they exploited the fact that her ankles were tied and her feet could only wriggle about.

'You're a mean evil person!"
"I am." she said and redoubled her efforts.
"Tickle tickle lil girl. No need to hurry so much, we can do this all night."

""Eeehahaha" Summer cried out in a ticklish tone. "Hey stop that!"

"I'll stop when you stop...ly~ing...Kitchikitchikitchi."

Summer made up her mind, what did it matter if she knew? Besides she didn't want to keep this up for the whole night, it wasn't even 11 o'clock yet, so she cried out...
1.title: The Serpent strikes

15.content: "Well? My fingers are waiting..."
15.title: Others...

choices: Summer tries diplomacy. (They stay and get tickled.)
Jamie doesn't wait (They all burst out a window and into a car.)
Chris provides a distraction. (They escape through the front lawn.)
151.content:
"Thank you so much. Adieu!"
Summer just about caught her breath when more guards with Chris and Jamie burst into the room.
"Summer! The Sheik's oil deeds got stolen again! And they are accusing us of the theft."
"Steady!" Summer said. "I'm sure we can talk it over with them like civilized people..."
151.title: "China!"

choices: "Wait! Pao and I are cool now."
1512.content:
Only one broken window and the three friends landed in Summer's trusty four-wheel drive.
"I don't know what they were so upset about us for, but let's get out of here!" Summer shouted.

And, one quick transitional montage later, we see out friends step out of their car in China! (town unspecified)

"Something tells me that we are going to see our thief friend here again." Summer smartly deduces. "I wonder what she'll be after here this time?"

"FINALLY you're here. My legs were getting sore just waiting for you during that montage."
A voice said.
They turned to see a bored Chinese girl with large glasses, headphones and a colorful American style T-shirt with the letters "PRODIGY".

"Pao-Ting!" Jamie recognized the face. "We've got you now!"

Summer raised a hand and said...
1512.title: They escape through a window

choices: They go to the museum first, to inspect the place of a missing object.
They need to receive their lodgings and see some officials.
They go to see Pao-Ting's family.
15121.content:
"Ehh? Since when?" her two friends asked, stopped on their tracks.
"It's a long story. Too long, I'd rather tell you some other time. Also, the author probably didn't even write it yet."

Chris still squinted at the Chinese girl suspiciously.
"Well, I don't trust her. If she so much as strokes your arm..."
He/She let out a growl that sounded like a guard dog's.

Jamie, on the other hand, adopted to the situation with the speed of a fish released into water. He/She walked over to Pao and put a friendly arm around her shoulder.

"So, Pao, as friends I feel like I should ask you this, are you feeling ticklish anywhere?"

"Don't trust her." was Summer's warning. "This is how (he) she sizes up (his) her victims."
The startled Pao quickly hid her feet.

"So" Summer said as they were driving down the main street. "What was it that caused us to be called here this time?"

"Y-Yeah, in a minute.." Pao said, trying to shake off Jamie's friendly arm.
15121.title: "Wait! Pao and I are cool now."

info.brief_description: Summer & co. travel around in the 5th Summer Salt story. (warning: tickle fetish themed!)
info.description:
full title:
Summer Salt and the Secrets of the Scheming Soft Soled Silky Smooth Skinned Slippery Serpent (& its Squirming Slaves)

summery:
Summer may bite more than she can chew when she is asked to pit her skills against a world famous lady thief.
